name: Minotaur
tagline: The game about labyrinths... and minotaurs.
body:
About
-----
This is an interpretation of paper-and-pencil game in form of a Sailfish app.
State of development
--------------------
It's in the state of a simple prototype. You can see how it looks on the picture below.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
